properties.name: Thai Tan Tien
properties.description: Guesthouse. Nice bungalows, quiet beach, restaurant, best value for money on Long Beach. First hackers are staying here.

properties.name: Lien Hiep Thanh
properties.description: Guesthouse with Wi-fi at beachfacing cafe/restaurant. It's just before Rorys bar. Some more hackers are staying here.

properties.name: Oyster Club
properties.description: Beach-front cafe and bar. No wi-fi. Rents out windsurfing boards (and optionally instructs beginners).

properties.name: John's Tours
properties.description: Booking agency for pretty much anything. Sets up a generator during power outages, so there's always wi-fi. Sells prepaid SIM cards with data usage included.

properties.name: Paradise City Club
properties.description: Bar and night club. Table football.

properties.name: Le Cap Breton
properties.description: French restaurant. Good food. Specialties: galettes, crÃªpes, quiche.

properties.name: Pepper's Pizza
properties.description: Italian food, burgers, pizza. No wifi, food is ok, but nothing great.

properties.name: German B
properties.description: German cafe and bar. Fast wi-fi, pool billards for free, fresh milk and cream, decent German food.

properties.name: Night Market
properties.description: Great for (sea)food, Apple and Facebook flip-flops, cheap fake shades and clothes size XS :)

properties.name: ATM (Vietcombank)
properties.description: In the middle of 2 other ATMs (the green one). Doesn't charge a fee.

properties.name: Pagode
properties.description: Don't go downhill here with crappy bicycle, or you'll regret it :-)

properties.name: Cafe Tuong
properties.description: Coffee shop next to the harbor. Tennis adjacent if that's your thing. Serves beer in the evening.

properties.name: Papparoti
properties.description: Roti bun and coffee shop. Really good buns, free wifi, power. (wifi PW papparoti123)
